title: Townsend Farms, Inc., Identifies Three New States Receiving Recalled Domestic Conventional Frozen Kirkland Three Berry Blend
description: Townsend Farms, Inc., in consultation with Costco, has identified three new states receiving the recalled conventional frozen Kirkland Three Berry Blend. On June 11, 2019, Townsend Farms, Inc., reported that Costco sold the frozen Kirkland Three Berry Blend, 4 lb bag only in stores located in San Di
